description: Approval of Condition 4 (Archaeologist report) and Condition 6 (Construction Management Plan) of Planning Permission ref: 18/14753/FUL (Erection of two storey side extension, part single storey, party two storey extensions and front dormer window roof extensions to facilitate loft conversion with balconies to the rear, Conversion of existing dwellinghouse into 8x residential units, providing 3x 3 bed and 4x 2 bed and 1x 1 bed with associated car parking, cycle storage and refuse storage (Amended plans - alterations to layout, set back of side extension and internal alterations) ) dated 01/03/2018
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the conditions, as noted above, are fully discharged.
Please confirm the description ''Alteration to rear extension and installation of ventilation duct.''
